Posts.EditableText: i'd like to have a passage of writing, then a line of blue- a link I think its called- this is clicked on, and then my next passage appears with various options in blue. I like to think of many pages out there in cyberspace without them being linked to one site. I don't know how to do this. talk of websites isn't really in the spirit of the thing. any ideas?
